rules.text: If your Army Faction is T'au Empire, then in your Shooting phase units from your army can work in pairs to help each other target specific enemy units. When they do this, one unit is the Observer unit and the other is their Guided unit. The enemy they are targeting is called their Spotted unit.

Each time you select this unit to shoot, if it is not an Observer unit, it can use this ability. If it does, select one other friendly unit with this ability that is also eligible to shoot (excluding Fortification, Battle- shocked and Observer units). Until the end of the phase, this unit is considered a Guided unit, and that friendly unit is considered an Observer unit. Then select one enemy unit that is visible to both your units to be their Spotted unit.

rules.title: Until the end of the phase

list: Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1 and, if their Observer unit has the Markerlight keyword, the attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.
Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that does not target their Spotted unit, worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1.
If your army includes any Ethereal units, it cannot include a Commander Farsight model.
If your army includes a Commander Farsight model, it cannot include any Ethereal units.

rules.text: From the third battle round onwards, all ranged weapons equipped by T'au Empire models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While a unit is a Guided unit (see For the Greater Good), weapons in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

rules.when: Fight phase or your opponent's 1CP Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
rules.target: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit's attacks.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

rules.target: One T'au Empire unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the Markerlight keyword, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

rules.target: One T'au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that can Fly whose attacks have been resolved this phase.
rules.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, your unit cannot declare a charge this turn.

rules.target: One T'au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
rules.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
rules.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

rules.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
rules.target: One T'au Empire Grenades unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
rules.effect: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

rules.when: Your opponent's Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
rules.target: One T'au Empire Infantry unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge, and one friendly Transport.
rules.effect: Your unit can embark within that Transport. If it does, your opponent can select new targets for that charge.
rules.restrictions: Every model in your T'au Empire Infantry unit must be within 3" of that Transport and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

rules.text: T'au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit's Kauyon Detachment rule takes effect from the second battle round onwards instead of the third.
T'au Empire model only. Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. From the third battle round onwards, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.
T'au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). Once per turn, you can use a Stratagem on the bearer's unit, even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

T'au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in their Guided unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability while targeting their Spotted unit.

drones.name: GUARDIAN DRONE
drones.text: Each time a model makes a ranged attack that targets the bearer's unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

drones.name: GUN DRONE
drones.text: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon

drones.name: MARKER DRONE
drones.text: The bearer's unit has the Markerlight keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.

drones.name: MISSILE DRONE
drones.text: The bearer is equipped with the following ranged weapon

drones.name: SHIELD DRONE
drones.text: Add 1 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

drones.name: GRAV-INHIBITOR DRONE
drones.text: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer's unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).

drones.title: PULSE ACCELERATOR DRONE
drones.text: Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer's unit.

drones.title: RECON DRONE
drones.text: The bearer is equipped with 1 drone burst cannon and the bearer's unit has the Infiltrators ability.

values.title: Agile Combatant
values.text: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

values.title: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
values.text: While a friendly T'au Empire unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

values.title: Advanced Guardian Drone
values.text: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

values.title: Command-link Drone (Aura)
values.text: While a friendly T'au Empire unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

values.title: This model is equipped with

If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

values.title: CORE
values.text: Deadly Demise D3, Firing Deck 20

values.title: Fortification
values.text: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army

list: That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

values.title: Tidewall Cover
values.text: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification , that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

values.title: Tidewall Defence Platform
values.text: If equipped with a Tidewall defence platform, this Fortification has a Wounds characteristic of 15.

list: This model can be equipped with 1 Tidewall defence platform.

values.text: This model has a transport capacity of 11 T'au Empire Infantry models. It cannot transport Battlesuit, Kroot or Vespid Stingwings models. If this model is equipped with a Tidewall defence platform, it has a transport capacity of 22 T'au Infantry models instead.
